group_1.narration: "Now then, it's time to start the club introductions."

group_1.textRight: Okay.
It's up to you, Meguru.

group_1.textLeft: Player Meguru has it covered!

group_1.textCenter: (It's her first time being in front of so many people, @and Hibiki's a bit nervous...!)
(But for the sake of becoming a popular MC, she will make this work no matter what...!)

group_1.narration: "Ladies and gentlemen, it's time to introduce the club you've all been waiting for: Minagi Liberty Academy’s esteemed chemistry club!"

group_1.textLeft: Huh... Who’s that...?

group_1.textRight: A chemistry club member...?

group_1.narration: “She's collected and mature! The belle of her peers, the female scientist Hinano Miyako leads the chemistry club! @They conduct research, attend competitions, and even host educational events for little kids! @There's always something to get involved with!"
"For those interested in chemistry! @And for those who want to try out a bunch of different things! @Be sure to pay close attention to what's next~!"

group_1.textRight: Okay then, I will now perform a demonstration for @you all.

group_1.textLeft: What exactly is the theme of this demo!?

group_1.textRight: It’s “beauty"!

group_1.textLeft: That's the perfect theme for the mature @Miyako-senpai!

group_1.textRight: Heh heh heh, of course, of course.
Then let's start...
Pour colored water and ammonium chloride into a @test tube.
Then heat it until it's thoroughly dissolved.
...Well we're short on time, so here’s a pre-dissolved mixture...

group_1.textLeft: What magnificent technique!
It’s just like on a cooking show!

group_1.textRight: ...Ahem.
...Now allow this saturated solution to stand at room temperature.
Well, I've already prepared a solution that has been @left to cool too...

group_1.textLeft: Wonderful!
What's next, what's next!?
What happens when the solution has cooled down!?
Will it change colors!? Explode!? Or...
These are...!
Star-shaped crystals are starting to form!!
[chara:800101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Oooh, pretty...!

group_1.textRight: Eh, what is it!? I want to get a closer look~.

group_1.textLeft: Just look at these stars dancing! How beautiful and lovely they are!
This is the chemistry club's true power!

group_1.textRight: First, let me explain.
The ammonium chloride became supersaturated at room temperature and began precipitating...
...I don’t think it's supposed to glitter this much...
...Did Meguru use some kind of magic on it...?

group_1.textLeft: Now that you've seen this chemical magic in action, you’re convinced, aren’t you?
Minagi Liberty Academy's chemistry club has many charming qualities!
New students!
Please consider joining the chemistry club~!

group_1.textRight: Ah, p-please think about it!

group_1.narration: "Thank you for the introduction to the chemistry club.”

group_1.textLeft: That girl providing commentary for the chemistry @club was awesome, I wonder if she's in the club?

group_1.textRight: No, that was Meguru from my class.
She's in the broadcasting club.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, really!?
Ah, excuse us! We're from the broadcasting club!

group_1.textRight: The girl who introduced the chemistry club just now
is Meguru Hibiki from the broadcasting club!
She's the newest member of the crew.

group_1.textLeft: If you'd like to request her talents, please contact us!
We’re also looking for new recruits to join us!

group_1.textRight: How gutsy...
Taking advantage of the presentation to advertise for the broadcasting club...
The chemistry club looked cool, wanna to try it out??

group_1.textLeft: I think I'm gonna join the broadcasting club.
It should be lots of fun with Meguru in it!

group_1.narration: "When all the clubs have finished their presentations, new students should feel free to head to their booths to find out more about each club."

group_1.textRight: Coming!
I'll take your requests for Meguru in order.

group_1.textLeft: Player Meguru will be sure to handle all the requests, without missing a single one!

group_1.textRight: Um, I want to join the broadcasting club...

group_1.textLeft: Really...!?@[chara:800200:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:800200:cheek_0][chara:800200:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:800200:lipSynch_1][chara:800200:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Thank you!!
